name: TurkeyBore
description:
A game I made for the Kenney Jam 2021 (Theme is rotation). I'm a beginner when it comes to making games and programming. I hope you at-least enjoy or have a laugh at the game. Thank you.

Assets used: https://kenney.nl/assets/food-kit, https://kenney.nl/assets/weapon-pack, https://kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit

Song? I made it with Boscaceoli
